longBusinessSummary: Unichem Laboratories Limited, a pharmaceutical company, manufactures and sells pharmaceutical products worldwide. The company offers formulation products that address various therapeutic areas, such as gastroenterology, cardiology, diabetology, psychiatry, neurology, anti-bacterial, anti-infective, and pain management. It also offers active pharmaceutical ingredients, as well as contract manufacturing services. In addition, the company manufactures allopathic medicines, bulk drugs, and chemicals. Unichem Laboratories Limited was founded in 1944 and is based in Mumbai, India.
